paramInformation.label: Association Led
paramInformation.description: Used during association process by simon shortcut switch io to turn on the main LED of all devices already associated to this shortcut

paramInformation.label: Delay On
paramInformation.description: Delay from activation request until load activation.  please note that possible values are referenced in hex format from 0x00 to 0xff (unsigned 1 byte values).  please refer to "Z-Wave command class specification, a-m" --> "multilevel switch set command" --> "duration table" specification to lean more about these values meaning

paramInformation.label: Activation Time
paramInformation.description: Time that load performs activated after complete an activation process.  please note that possible values are referenced in hex format from 0x00 to 0xff (unsigned 1 byte values).  please refer to "Z-Wave command class specification, a-m" --> "multilevel switch set command" --> "duration table" specification to lean more about these values meaning

paramInformation.label: Behavior of LED in Repose
paramInformation.description: Configuration of main LED as identification at 20%

options.label: Led on at 20% of maximum level

paramInformation.label: Lock Input
paramInformation.description: Locks the pushbutton and wired input actions

options.label: Unlock the direct control of load
Lock the direct control of load

paramInformation.label: Reset Default
paramInformation.description: Device persorms a factoy default reset

options.label: Device persorms a factoy default reset

paramInformation.label: Delay Off
paramInformation.description: Delay from deactivation request until load deactivation.  please note that possible values are referenced in hex format from 0x00 to 0xff (unsigned 1 byte values)  please refer to "Z-Wave command class specification, a-m" --> "multilevel switch set command" --> "duration table" specification to lean more about these values meaning

metadata.inclusion:
When the pushbutton is released after a press of (2sec<T<20sec) the device will send a NIF to include from Z-Wave network or perform an association with other Z-Wave device.
Main LED will Blink with 0,3 sec period to inform that NIF can be send after release of pushbutton.

This process does not perform a default reset of configurations.

Main LED will Blink with 0,3 sec period to inform that NIF can be send after release of pushbutton
metadata.exclusion:
When the pushbutton is released after a press of (2sec<T<20sec) the device will send a NIF to exclude from Z-Wave network or perform an association with other Z-Wave device.
Main LED will Blink with 0,3 sec period to inform that NIF can be send after release of pushbutton.

This process does not perform a default reset of configurations.

Main LED will Blink with 0,3 sec period to inform that NIF can be send after release of pushbutton
metadata.reset:
When the pushbutton is released after a press of (20sec<T) the device will perform a factory default values operation, excluding it from network and resetÃ­ng the configuration parameters.

Main LED will perform 1 Blink with 5 sec.

Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
